footer.description: Let creativity out of the classroom. HackIt empowers teenagers to build their own creative education revolution.

aboutSection.tagline: Inspiring future tech leaders with <highlight>innovative thinking</highlight>
aboutSection.introduction: HackIt is Taiwan's first teen-led creative community. We organize our own events, write our own code, and make our own impact. Rejecting rote learning and passive waiting, HackIt empowers every teenager to build their own future.
aboutSection.founderStoryParagraph1: HackIt was born in 2024, started by four high school students. After being invited to a global Hack Club hackathon, we challenged ourselves to create Taiwan's first-ever teen-organized hackathon. No one knew if it would work, but we believed that without trying, we'd never find out.
aboutSection.founderStoryParagraph2: We refuse to let youth be defined by exams and textbooks alone. Through action, we prove that creativity and adventure aren't limited by age. From initial chaos to growing competence, we showed Taiwan that even a group of high schoolers can host impactful, inspiring events. HackIt became our gentle yet powerful challenge to the educational system.
aboutSection.founderStoryParagraph3: When creativity becomes routine, HackIt transforms from an event into an attitude‚Äîa youth culture of curiosity, courage, and collaboration. We've seen participants find direction here, feel understood, and realize for the first time: 'I too can change something.' HackIt doesn't just offer a stage, but a place where teens regain confidence in themselves. We witness firsthand: when young people are truly believed in, they create possibilities adults can't even imagine. Learning should never be confined to the classroom.
aboutSection.coreValueInnovativeDescription: We reject the mindset of 'it's always been this way.' Encouraging innovation, questioning norms, and redefining what truly matters in learning.
aboutSection.coreValueCommunityDescription: Every day deserves a step outside your comfort zone. True growth comes from trying what scares yet excites you. We're here to stumble, laugh, and fly together.
aboutSection.coreValuePracticalDescription: You don't need to meet others' standards of 'excellence'; you're strongest as yourself. We believe everyone has a spark waiting to be seen, needing only a place to ignite.
aboutSection.coreValueLifelongLearningDescription: We say no to empty talk and theoretical exercises. Ideas matter only when executed, built by hand, and able to impact the world.
aboutSection.ctaText: Want to learn more about our story and team?
aboutSection.missionVisionSubtitle: The core beliefs and ambitious goals driving us forward
aboutSection.teamSubheader: A passionate group of educators and tech experts
missionShort: HackIt's mission is to make teens seen and believed in.
We believe Taiwanese students aren't lacking talent, just opportunity.
When education values creativity over standardized answers,
those silent teens will begin to shine, even lighting others' paths.
manifestoShort: We're building more than events‚Äîwe're creating a culture.
Making action, courage, and mutual inspiration daily youth experiences.
When young people are trusted, they become not just participants, but catalysts of change.
aboutSection.coreIdealsPromise: Our core ideals and commitment to the future
aboutSection.notionDescription: Find detailed information about HackIt on Notion, including event histories, our origin story, and core philosophies.

ctaSection.description: Join a youth-driven tech community where dreaming big and building even bigger go hand in hand. Whether you're just starting out or already creating amazing things, there's a place for you here.
ctaSection.contactButton: Talk to Us About Your Dreams
ctaSection.noCommitment: No commitment needed ‚Äî jump in and start exploring with us today!

youthIntroSection.tagline: Built for young dreamers who dare to create

description.first: HackIt is a hidden haven for teens who dare to dream and build. Here, we challenge norms, break limits, and
description.highlighted: take action to define our own future

coding.title: Create to change the world
coding.description: We don't just code‚Äîwe use tech and creativity to solve real problems and turn ideas into impactful actions.

community.title: Find your people
community.description: Join a tribe of bold and curious youth who support each other, share sparks of inspiration, and push boundaries together.

portfolio.title: Grow your impact and confidence
portfolio.description: Learn through building, grow through challenges, and turn every effort into the confidence to take on the world‚Äîone page ahead of the rest.

cta.message1: Whether you're just starting out or already building something that matters,
